channel.title: Lost Valentino's Client Release with 634 maps!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://zeus.cooltext.com/rendered/cooltext643522843.png[/img]
Hello everyone
This what im releasing is from Lost Valentino. He gave me permission to post it for him! He asked me if i could post here his client with some 634 maps.
This contains: 602 anims 634 character models 634 - 525 - 508 maps 634 - 525 objects and much more, here under the original post: perfect 508 flo.dat loc.dat and lod.idx from a 525
[B]Hey guys,[/B]
so, i got bored this weekend and i start working a bit on a client, and i know that this has been released but a few people asked over msn if i wanna release it so here it is.. btw this is just a cheap fix for loading the maps;) I didnt have much time this weekend some im gonna release the 634 object, map_index and idx5 files for you guys. have fun:) This release got a few 634 maps.
Some 634 maps: [IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/8955/rtretk.png[/img] [IMG]http://img36.imageshack.us/img36/2974/dsfl.png[/img] [IMG]http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/1588/gggcw.png[/img] [IMG]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/7005/dsanr.png[/img] [IMG]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/5580/wwwqr.png[/img] [IMG]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/857/dsfsdfgj.png[/img] [IMG]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/8721/dddsk.png[/img] [IMG]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/6963/sdasdad.png[/img] [IMG]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/8440/ertfd.png[/img] [IMG]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/7892/wwwg.png[/img]
Here under you can download the client and the other stuff
[B]Client download:[/B] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?vj4g2ng77dn40o6]Valentino's project client.rar[/url]
[B]Cache download:[/B] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?5b0rqdz3vgaeo2g]Valentino's project cache.rar[/url]
[B]634 map_index:[/B] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?xx0do0d91sdgzy7]map index.rar[/url]
[B]634objects:[/B] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?lvspexm509erl2d]634objects.rar[/url]
[B]634idx5files:[/B] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ihpa7ze6miv8bo6]634 DecyptedIdx5Files.rar[/url]
[B]oh and at least, not all maps working, so you need to fix it yourself![/B][/center]

item.title: Lost Valentino's Client Release with 634 maps!
item.dc:creator: @Squirt_Ltd Squirt Ltd
item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

best 317 client in history

i mean who the fuck uses an actual 634 client with high detail, way better graphics overall and no hardcoded shit that creates 8945546 bugs that need to be dealt with if you can use this right?

Read full topic

@Visible wrote:

[center]

Hello everyone

This what im releasing is from Lost Valentino.
He gave me permission to post it for him!
He asked me if i could post here his client with some 634 maps.

This contains:
602 anims
634 character models
634 - 525 - 508 maps
634 - 525 objects
and much more, here under the original post:
perfect 508 flo.dat
loc.dat and lod.idx from a 525

Hey guys,

so, i got bored this weekend and i start working a bit on a client, and i know that this has been released but a few people asked over msn if i wanna release it so here it is… btw this is just a cheap fix for loading the maps;)
I didnt have much time this weekend some im gonna release the 634 object, map_index and idx5 files for you guys. have fun:)
This release got a few 634 maps.
